mulinma kiyanna oona anunta pissu kiyanne koyi wage ayada kiyala.oonama manasika rogiyek kiyanne thamanta ara loketama pissu kiyala.senaka kiyala koment dana pissatath eeka adalayi.ayi umbae ammata hachchin giyada?ganika wruththiya nithigatha kaloth umbae amma eekata yana eka walakwanna sakkarayatawath ba.ehema kiyanne chinthanayata pawa janamaya balapamak athi bawa soya gena athi nisayi.umbaa dawasak hari je wi pi karapu ekek bawa mama danagaththe katha karapu shailiyen.ehema nathnam eks kandayama kiyana lumpan sakkili gaෲp eke inna athi.umbaa mona widiye ekekda kiyala therum ganna wena mokawathma oona na.mama kisima koment ekaka ganika wruththiya nithigatha karanna epa kiyala na.mama kiyanneth ganika wruththiyath gabsawath nithigatha karanna kiyalayi.umbaa mano bhranthiyak widiyata mama eekata wiruddha wuna kiyala hithala koment karanawa.balapan pissu umbaata neda?
